argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isgim.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | isgim.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp /\ F e. { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } ) <-> ( ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) /\ F e. { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-gim | |- GrpIso = ( a e. Grp , b e. Grp |-> { c e. ( a GrpHom b ) | c : ( Base ` a ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` b ) } ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( a GrpHom b ) e. _V |
| 6 | 5 | #P_rabex | |- { c e. ( a GrpHom b ) | c : ( Base ` a ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` b ) } e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( a = R /\ b = S ) -> ( a GrpHom b ) = ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( a = R -> ( Base ` a ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( a = R -> ( Base ` a ) = B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( b = S -> ( Base ` b ) = ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 11 | 10, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( b = S -> ( Base ` b ) = C ) |
| 12 |  | #P_f1oeq23 | |- ( ( ( Base ` a ) = B /\ ( Base ` b ) = C ) -> ( c : ( Base ` a ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` b ) <-> c : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 11, 12 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( a = R /\ b = S ) -> ( c : ( Base ` a ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` b ) <-> c : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( ( a = R /\ b = S ) -> { c e. ( a GrpHom b ) | c : ( Base ` a ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` b ) } = { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } ) |
| 15 | 4, 6, 14 | #P_elovmpt2 | |- ( F e. ( R GrpIso S ) <-> ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp /\ F e. { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ghmgrp1 | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> R e. Grp ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ghmgrp2 | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> S e. Grp ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_jca | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) -> ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_pm4.71ri | |- ( ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) <-> ( ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_f1oeq1 | |- ( c = F -> ( c : B -1-1-onto-> C <-> F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_elrab | |- ( F e. { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_anbi2i | |- ( ( ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) /\ F e. { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } ) <-> ( ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) ) |
| 24 | 20, 23 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) <-> ( ( R e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) /\ F e. { c e. ( R GrpHom S ) | c : B -1-1-onto-> C } ) ) |
| 25 | 3, 15, 24 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( F e. ( R GrpIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
